ProductionProcess.Name: Mobile Robot Assembly
ProductionProcess.Description: A comprehensive process for assembling the mobile robots, including all Steps from component assembly to final testing.

Steps.Description: Prepare and organize all necessary components for assembly.

Steps.Name: Chassis Assembly
Steps.Description: Assemble the main chassis of the mobile robot, including mounting the frame and wheels.

Steps.Name: Electrical Wiring
Steps.Description: Install and connect all electrical components, including wiring the sensors and control units.

Steps.Name: Software Installation
Steps.Description: Install and configure the software necessary for the mobile robot's operation, including firmware and control algorithms.

Steps.Name: Final Testing
Steps.Description: Perform final testing and calibration of the mobile robot to ensure all components are functioning correctly.

ProductionProcess.additionalNotes: Ensure all safety protocols are followed, particularly during electrical wiring and final testing phases.
